name: BURIED (itch)
description:
This is a short horror prototype project inspired by silent hill pt, designed and developed by Sam Feng from the LuHi Game Dev Club.  

Most the resource model and sound is taken from Yobi3D and Freesound, if there's a copyright issue or if you found a glitch, please contact with me, thank you!

Buried uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2018, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
